function.description:
Converts the date to a string using the provided format.
If no format is given the pattern "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" is used.
| Symbol | Meaning | | ------ | -------- | | u/y/Y | year | | Q/q | quarter-of-year | | M/L | month-of-year | | d | day-of-month | | E | day-of-week | | H | hour-of-day | | m | minute-of-hour | | s | second-of-minute | | a | am/pm | | ' | escape for text ('text') | | '' | literal ' |
Apart from the characters ' [ ] # { } any other special UTF-8 character has no functionality in the format and could be used freely.
For more information see Java's pattern definition
